title: Here's what worked the last time stagflation reared its ugly head, according to Goldman Sachs
text:
As Democrats' tax proposals evolve, the outlook for the super-rich is improving

The Biden administration hopes it can seal a deal soon on its social safety net program See full story.

Vroom. U.S. economy revs up in October after delta speed bump

The large service sector of the U.S. economy sped up in October after hitting a bump caused by the coronavirus delta variant a month earlier and manufacturers also expanded activity rapidly, but ongoing labor shortages and supply bottlenecks acted as a drag on growth. See full story.

Pfizer data boosts hopes children will soon be eligible for COVID-19 vaccine, and CDC expands booster program

There was good news for parents Friday when Pfizer said the vaccine it developed with German partner BioNTech proved 90.7% effective in preventing symptomatic COVID-19 in children aged 5 to 11 in a clinical trial, using a 10 mg dose instead of the 30 mg given to adults. See full story.

Best New Ideas in Money: The new science of changing your financial behavior

In the new episode of the podcast, a deep dive on how to edit your money and investing habits See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Also, how Elon Musk can become a trillionaire, Tesla's great results and a surprising retirement destination. See full story.
